page.title: 15FARMING IN QUARRINGTON AREA
page.content: The{primary land cover}in our D block is{farm land.}There are five farms in the block. The biggest is{Mountain's {farm}with 3000 acres of land.{Silk {Willoughby}has the small Gables Farm which has 240 acres. The main{crops}in this area are wheat, barley, potatoes and sugar beet. Mr Mowbray Mountain also keeps{sheep. He runs a company called{Farm Plant {Services}which helps other farmers to {fertilize}and{harvest}their crops. He employs 32 men. Mr Mountain has low volume and high volume{grain driers built on his farm premises. The{weather}is a critical factor in the farmers' lives. At harvest they like hot and dry weather. They prefer cold weather in the winter because it kills disease and breaks up the soil. They like rain in spring.
